view

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to render the visible world onto the game canvas. Thie class has a drawable representation of the world and knows which parts of it to draw at any given time based on the game camera. That way, rather than inefficiently rendering the whole map, only a portion of it that is visible is actually rendered at any given time.

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        private boolean isVisible(DrawableEntity e)
        Checks whether a drawable entity is within view of the world.
        Parameters:
        e - The entity to check.
        Returns:
        true If the specified entity can be seen within the canvas or is at most one tile-unit outside of the canvas.

      • isVisible

        private boolean isVisible(DrawableTile t)
        Checks whether a drawable tile is within view of the world.
        Parameters:
        t - The tile to check.
        Returns:
        true If the specified tile can be seen within the canvas or is at most one tile-unit outside of the canvas.
